Aryll's Theme, LoZ Wind Waker (Harmonica Tab)

September 16, 2018

Author: Bianca Yang
Email: ipacifics@gmail.com

The Wind Waker was by far my favorite childhood video game, and the Gamecube my favorite console. Here’s a throwback piece for all you Nintendo fans.
